Description:
Thorough knowledge of DHA policies and regulations regarding pharmaceuticals.
Ability to gain the confidence of and work with all levels in the Medical services, and collaborative departments.
Can deal with government authorities with regard to Pharmacy regulatory issues.
Participates actively in organization-wide activities without hesitance or personal reservation.
Can adapt to unusual job-related circumstances.
Works effectively under stressful conditions.
Willing to work extended hours to attend to emergency cases.
Willing to relocate to other SG Hospitals in order to fill in the gap, if needed.
Expert in dealing with clients.Job Details
